q: Mike Pence announcement expected today, not tomorrow POLITICO has learned: Mike Pence is expected to announce late Thursday whether he is running for president, POLITICO has learned. The announcement will appear first in the Indianapolis Star, an aide said. Mike Pence has been deliberating over his political future, stepping down from House Republican leadership as he mulls whether to run for president

In explaining his decision to pass the boss torch back to co-founder Larry Page , Google CEO Eric Schmidt tweeted that, ha-ha,`` adult supervision is no longer needed at the company that dominates internet search and advertising. And Google's monster fourth-quarter earnings offer evidence that Eric Schmidt is true to his tweet: profits reached$ 2.5 billion on sales of$ 8.4

Eric Schmidt 's explanation of his role change is seen by many as a nice way of acknowledging what former Google designer Douglas Bowman href="http://stopdesign.com/archive/2009/03/20/goodbye-google.html"> said when he famously left the Internet giant in 2009: Yes, it's true that a team at Google couldn't decide between two blues, so they're testing 41 shades between each blue to see which one performs better. I had a recent debate over whether a border should be 3, 4 or 5 pixels wide, and was asked to prove my case. I can't operate in an environment like that. I've grown tired of debating such minuscule design decisions. There are more exciting design problems in this world to tackle. What else does the change mean? The decision came down to how best optimise Google's triumvirate of power( Eric Schmidt , Larry Page and Sergey Brin ) to become a more adaptable enterprise. Larry Page , Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured, Eric Schmidt said. MVP and four-time scoring champion plans to play in his 11th straight All-Star game Feb. 14 at Cowboys Stadium.`` My fans still support me. You can't ask for more than that,'' he said. When you play this game, it's all about the people that come to see you, the people in the stands. For somebody to say the fans don't mean anything, that's crazy. of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011. Both on-premises and cloud-based versions of the platform will be available in 40 markets and 41 languages starting Feb. 28. A Jan. 17 statement by Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer emphasized Dynamics CRM's familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data. Microsoft finds itself locked in fierce battle for CRM market-share with Salesforce.com and Oracle, both of which have shown little hesitation in both updating their products and sniping at their rivals. Africa's( MFWA) correspondent in C?te d'Ivoire reported that Tanou received three SMS text messages claiming that she now supports Alassane Ouattara , the internationally recognised president of the country. One of the messages read: It is you journalists of the Groupe Olympe who are saying bad things about Gbagbo. Be careful, otherwise one day the GPP will visit you at night. As for you Tanou, we know where you live. You support the RHDP( Rally of Houphouetists for Democracy Peace), you will see. When your premises went up in flames, was it not Gbagbo who bailed you out? And you go about castigating him. We are not joking. We will skin you alive. You will see. I'm troubled by the fact that within the party we have these kinds of expressions about Muslims, said Colin Powell , who was the country's first black secretary of state.`` We have got to stop polarizing ourselves.''
